name: Downtown Run-Down
description:
W / A / S / D: Movement
SPACE: Jump
Shift: Sprint
Q: Super Power
E: Interact

Left Mouse: Hammer Attack

F: Select Bomb
Right Mouse: Place Bomb

- Download the .zip and extract it.

- Run the .exe
